flawed_nl_solution:
Of the under-30s there for the second band, 40% are men because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are fifty under-30s there for the second band because 20 / 0.4 = <<20/0.4=50>>50
There are 100 people there to see the second band because 50 / 0.5 = <<50/0.5=10>>10
There are 150 people at the concert because 10 / (2/3) = <<10/(2/3)=15>>15
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 10. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
